verses.verse: In <WG1722> the mean time<WG3739>, when the many<WG3793> thousands of the multitude<WG3461> were gathered together<WG1996>, insomuch that<WG5620> they trod<WG2662> one upon another<WG240>, he began<WG756> to say<WG3004> unto<WG4314> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> first of all<WG4412>, Beware<WG4337> ye<WG1438> of<WG575> the leaven<WG2219> of the Pharisees<WG5330>, which<WG3748> is<WG2076> hypocrisy<WG5272>.
